content.question: After reading the scenario, please respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the Constitutional step required prior to the Senate’s vote on John Roberts and explain how this process demonstrates checks and balances. Explain how the Senate process described in the scenario could affect the president’s choice of John Roberts. Describe what Roberts’ statement during the public hearings in the scenario indicates about his views on the role of the court, and explain how this could affect his future decisions.
